description: Oboro is a female ninja supporting the demonic organization "http://anidb.net/ch27737 [Nomad]", a leader of army of mercenaries called the Oboro Forbearance Army. Once the head of the school of Koka, she has greatly contributed to the expansion of influence and power of Nomad in Japan. On one occasion she was killed by http://anidb.net/ch11298 [Asagi], but from borrowing the bodies of demons, she was able to revive herself and now dictates a dark arena known as the Chaos Arena.
name: Oboro
